article_title: In pictures: Thick black smoke rises from Gaza Strip.
sentence: Israel's  national  security  advisor  claimed  the  army  had  killed  some  7,000  militants  in  fighting  which  has  been  concentrated  in  southern  Gaza.

article_title: In pictures: Thick black smoke rises from Gaza Strip.
sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says  that  dozens  of  people  have  been  killed,  not  just  in  Khan  Younis  but  across  Gaza  in  the  past  twenty-four  hours.
